metadata.Plot: Billy starts as a kitchen helper, is thrown out, and repairs to a restaurant where he is engaged as a waiter. His position doesn't last long, but it remains for an automobile and a pretty girl to put him in soft. He is dined and wined at the palatial home of the girl and during his stay was "some time." A tea party is in progress when Billy turns loose a mouse and the excitement starts. He is a bit too rough to suit the old man who shows him the door and the fade-out finds Billy again facing the cold, cold world.
metadata.Actors: Billy West, Oliver Hardy, Ethel Marie Burton
